Summarize hierarchy counts

Source: R/tidyMS_R6_AnalysisConfiguration.R
summarize_hierarchy.Rd

Summarize hierarchy counts

summarize_hierarchy(
  pdata,
  config,
  hierarchy = config$table$hkeysDepth(),
  factors = character()
)

Arguments

pdata

data.frame
config

AnalysisConfiguration
hierarchy

for which hierarchy level (default up to hierarchy depth)
factors

which factors to include

See also

Other summary: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, hierarchy_counts_sample(), hierarchy_counts(), summarize_protein()

Examples

library(LFQService)
library(tidyverse)
bb <- LFQServiceData::skylinePRMSampleData_A
configur <- bb$config_f()
data <- bb$analysis(bb$data, configur)

#> creating sampleName
#> completing cases

summarize_hierarchy(data, configur)

#> # A tibble: 37 x 5
#>    protein_Id        Isotope.Label.Ty~ peptide_Id_n precursor_Id_n fragment_Id_n
#>    <chr>                         <int>        <int>          <int>         <int>
#>  1 CiRT standards                    1           10             13           103
#>  2 iRT-C18 Standard~                 1           10             10            77
#>  3 sp|O60656|UD19_H~                 1            1              1             8
#>  4 sp|P02768|ALBU_H~                 1            4              4            30
#>  5 sp|P05177|CP1A2_~                 1            3              3            23
#>  6 sp|P09488|GSTM1_~                 1            2              2            14
#>  7 sp|P10632|CP2C8_~                 1            4              4            30
#>  8 sp|P11509|CP2A6_~                 1            2              2            16
#>  9 sp|P11712|CP2C9_~                 1            2              2            16
#> 10 sp|P16662|UD2B7_~                 1            4              4            32
#> # ... with 27 more rows
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur, factors = character())

#> # A tibble: 37 x 5
#>    protein_Id        Isotope.Label.Ty~ peptide_Id_n precursor_Id_n fragment_Id_n
#>    <chr>                         <int>        <int>          <int>         <int>
#>  1 CiRT standards                    1           10             13           103
#>  2 iRT-C18 Standard~                 1           10             10            77
#>  3 sp|O60656|UD19_H~                 1            1              1             8
#>  4 sp|P02768|ALBU_H~                 1            4              4            30
#>  5 sp|P05177|CP1A2_~                 1            3              3            23
#>  6 sp|P09488|GSTM1_~                 1            2              2            14
#>  7 sp|P10632|CP2C8_~                 1            4              4            30
#>  8 sp|P11509|CP2A6_~                 1            2              2            16
#>  9 sp|P11712|CP2C9_~                 1            2              2            16
#> 10 sp|P16662|UD2B7_~                 1            4              4            32
#> # ... with 27 more rows

summarize_hierarchy(data, configur,
 hierarchy = configur$table$hkeysDepth() )

#> # A tibble: 37 x 5
#>    protein_Id        Isotope.Label.Ty~ peptide_Id_n precursor_Id_n fragment_Id_n
#>    <chr>                         <int>        <int>          <int>         <int>
#>  1 CiRT standards                    1           10             13           103
#>  2 iRT-C18 Standard~                 1           10             10            77
#>  3 sp|O60656|UD19_H~                 1            1              1             8
#>  4 sp|P02768|ALBU_H~                 1            4              4            30
#>  5 sp|P05177|CP1A2_~                 1            3              3            23
#>  6 sp|P09488|GSTM1_~                 1            2              2            14
#>  7 sp|P10632|CP2C8_~                 1            4              4            30
#>  8 sp|P11509|CP2A6_~                 1            2              2            16
#>  9 sp|P11712|CP2C9_~                 1            2              2            16
#> 10 sp|P16662|UD2B7_~                 1            4              4            32
#> # ... with 27 more rows
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur,
 hierarchy = NULL, factors = configur$table$fkeysDepth() )

#> # A tibble: 8 x 6
#>   Time  Isotope.Label.Ty~ protein_Id_n peptide_Id_n precursor_Id_n fragment_Id_n
#>   <chr>             <int>        <int>        <int>          <int>         <int>
#> 1 T0                    1           37          117            120           889
#> 2 T168                  1           37          117            120           896
#> 3 T2                    1           37          117            120           899
#> 4 T24                   1           37          117            120           898
#> 5 T240                  1           37          117            120           887
#> 6 T336                  1           37          117            120           889
#> 7 T72                   1           37          117            120           893
#> 8 T8                    1           37          117            120           896
configur$table$hierarchyDepth = 1
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur,
 factors = configur$table$fkeysDepth())

#> # A tibble: 296 x 6
#> # Groups:   Time [8]
#>    Time  protein_Id   Isotope.Label.T~ peptide_Id_n precursor_Id_n fragment_Id_n

configur$table$hierarchyDepth = 2
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur)

#> # A tibble: 119 x 5
#> # Groups:   protein_Id [37]
